alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 9:01PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...An outflow produced by strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Otero, Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 901 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow produced by strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles south of Truckton to 14 miles northeast of Boone to 6 miles west of Fowler. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rocky Ford, Fowler, Ordway, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Sugar City and Crowley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
